info.name: EASB - Auth Module API
info.description: API collection for Authentication Module - managing user authentication, login, token refresh, logout, and token revocation.

request.description:
Authenticate user and receive access token. This endpoint is public (no authentication required).

**Fields:**
- `username` (string, required): Username (3-50 characters)
- `password` (string, required): Password (6-100 characters)

**Response:**
- Returns an access token in the response body
- Sets a refresh token as an HttpOnly cookie

Refresh the access token using the refresh token stored in HttpOnly cookie. This endpoint is public but requires a valid refresh token cookie.

**Authentication:**
- Requires refresh token in HttpOnly cookie (automatically sent by browser)
- No Authorization header needed

**Response:**
- Returns a new access token
- Sets a new refresh token as an HttpOnly cookie

Logout the current user. Requires authentication.

**Authentication:**
- Requires valid JWT access token in Authorization header

**Effect:**
- Clears the refresh token cookie

item.name: Admin Operations (SUPERADMIN Only)

request.description:
Revoke all refresh tokens for a specific user. Requires SUPERADMIN role.

**Fields:**
- `userId` (number, required): ID of the user whose tokens should be revoked

**Authentication:**
- Requires SUPERADMIN role

**Effect:**
- Revokes all refresh tokens for the specified user
- Clears the refresh token cookie for the current session
